definitions.definition: a group of close-knit and interrelated families (especially associated with families in the Scottish Highlands).
examples: group of families, sept; Morefamily, house, dynasty, tribe; kinship group "the Macleod clan"Morefamily, house, dynasty, tribe; kinship group the Macleod clan

definitions.definition: a family, especially a large one.
examples: the Kennedy clan gathered for the celebration

definitions.definition: a group of people with a strong common interest.
examples: New York's garrulous clan of artists
